oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-01-19 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from January 19, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hank Snow (host/performer), guest performers Bill Carlisle and the Carlisles, and regular performers the Old Hickory Quartet, Chubby Wise, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. It is mentioned that Rod Brasfield is in hospital. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Carlisles; Grandpa Jones; Hank Snow
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) [continued from part 1] -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Minnie Pearl) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Hank Snow introduces Carlisles -- I'm Rough Stuff (Carlisles) -- Hank Snow introduces Grandpa Jones -- Fly Around My Pretty Little Miss (Grandpa Jones) -- Hank Snow talks -- My Mother (Hank Snow) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Hank Snow) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Turner, Grant; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Old Hickory Singers; Wise, Chubby; Carlisle, Bill; Carlisles (Musical group); Snow, Hank
